MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 and CH3 postcode areas of Tarporley and Kelsall, affecting properties in Willington Lane, Quarry Lane, The Wynd and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:15PM on 23rd April 2021.
